languages.text: "Свет упал на мое лицо лишь дважды — когда я увидела пред собой святую реликвию. И когда увидела выход наружу, в ясный день. Но каждый миг этого темного путешествия я знала, что не одна. Свет Терры и призыв моей святой покровительницы были со мной".

traits.locale_text: "Свет упал на мое лицо лишь дважды — когда я увидела пред собой святую реликвию. И когда увидела выход наружу, в ясный день. Но каждый миг этого темного путешествия я знала, что не одна. Свет Терры и призыв моей святой покровительницы были со мной".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."
languages.original_text: "Свет упал на мое лицо лишь дважды — когда я увидела пред собой святую реликвию. И когда увидела выход наружу, в ясный день. Но каждый миг этого темного путешествия я знала, что не одна. Свет Терры и призыв моей святой покровительницы были со мной".

traits.locale_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out toward the bright of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patroness saint were with me the entire way."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out toward the bright of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patroness saint were with me the entire way."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「2回だけ、光が我の顔の上に降り注ぎました。聖遺物を目の前にした時、そして日の光へと続く出口を見た時。けれども闇の中を進む旅の間ずっと、我は一人ではないと分かっていた。道中ずっと、地球の光と我の守護者の呼びかけが常に我とともにあったのです」
languages.original_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."

traits.locale_text: 「2回だけ、光が我の顔の上に降り注ぎました。聖遺物を目の前にした時、そして日の光へと続く出口を見た時。けれども闇の中を進む旅の間ずっと、我は一人ではないと分かっていた。道中ずっと、地球の光と我の守護者の呼びかけが常に我とともにあったのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “整场旅途中，我只见到了两次亮光，一次是看到那件圣物时，一次是走出圣船，看到外面的星光时。不过，在那场黑暗的旅途中，我很清楚我并不孤独，因为泰拉之光与守护圣人的召唤始终伴我左右。”
languages.original_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."

traits.locale_text: “整场旅途中，我只见到了两次亮光，一次是看到那件圣物时，一次是走出圣船，看到外面的星光时。不过，在那场黑暗的旅途中，我很清楚我并不孤独，因为泰拉之光与守护圣人的召唤始终伴我左右。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Deux fois seulement la lumière a éclairé mon visage : quand j'ai vu devant moi la relique sacrée, et quand j'ai repéré l'éclat du jour, sur le chemin du retour. Mais tout au long de ce périple ténébreux, pas une seconde je ne me suis sentie seule. La lumière de Terra et l'appel de ma sainte patronne m'ont accompagnée de bout en bout. »
languages.original_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."

traits.locale_text: « Deux fois seulement la lumière a éclairé mon visage : quand j'ai vu devant moi la relique sacrée, et quand j'ai repéré l'éclat du jour, sur le chemin du retour. Mais tout au long de ce périple ténébreux, pas une seconde je ne me suis sentie seule. La lumière de Terra et l'appel de ma sainte patronne m'ont accompagnée de bout en bout. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La luz solo alcanzó mi rostro en dos ocasiones: cuando tuve la reliquia sagrada ante mí y cuando encontré la salida y vi la deslumbrante luz del día. Pero durante todo mi viaje por las tinieblas, siempre supe que no estaba sola. La luz de Terra y la llamada de mi patrona me acompañaban en todo momento».
languages.original_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."

traits.locale_text: «La luz solo alcanzó mi rostro en dos ocasiones: cuando tuve la reliquia sagrada ante mí y cuando encontré la salida y vi la deslumbrante luz del día. Pero durante todo mi viaje por las tinieblas, siempre supe que no estaba sola. La luz de Terra y la llamada de mi patrona me acompañaban en todo momento».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Nur zweimal fiel Licht auf mein Gesicht: als ich das heilige Relikt vor mir sah, und als ich den Ausgang ins helle Tageslicht erblickte. Aber ich wusste in jedem Augenblick dieser dunklen Reise, dass ich nicht alleine war. Das Licht von Terra und der Ruf meiner Schutzheiligen waren die gesamte Zeit bei mir."
languages.original_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."

traits.locale_text: "Nur zweimal fiel Licht auf mein Gesicht: als ich das heilige Relikt vor mir sah, und als ich den Ausgang ins helle Tageslicht erblickte. Aber ich wusste in jedem Augenblick dieser dunklen Reise, dass ich nicht alleine war. Das Licht von Terra und der Ruf meiner Schutzheiligen waren die gesamte Zeit bei mir."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Işık, yalnızca iki kez yüzümde parladı: İlki kutsal yadigârı gördüğüm andı, ikincisi ise parlak gün ışığına giden çıkışı gördüğüm an. Ancak biliyordum, o karanlık yolculuğun her anında yalnız olmadığımın farkındaydım. Terra'nın ışığı ve koruyucu azizemin çağrısı, yol boyunca benimleydi."
languages.original_text: "Only twice did light fall upon my face: when I saw the sacred relic before me and when I saw the way out, into the bright light of day. But through every moment of that dark journey, I knew I was not alone. The light of Terra and the call of my patron saint were with me the entire way."

traits.locale_text: "Işık, yalnızca iki kez yüzümde parladı: İlki kutsal yadigârı gördüğüm andı, ikincisi ise parlak gün ışığına giden çıkışı gördüğüm an. Ancak biliyordum, o karanlık yolculuğun her anında yalnız olmadığımın farkındaydım. Terra'nın ışığı ve koruyucu azizemin çağrısı yol boyunca benimleydi."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
